London is one of the world's most iconic travel destinations, offering a perfect blend of history, culture, and modern attractions. Whether you are planning to explore Buckingham Palace, ride the London Eye, or want to enjoy an evening tea, careful planning can save you both money and time. With stunning architecture, gorgeous gardens, busy streets, and iconic sites, London as a city has everything to offer. Explore the city's exhilarating nightlife, grand theater shows, and mouth-watering foods.

When is the Best Time to Book Flights to London?

The best time to book flights to London is around 45-60 days (8-12 weeks) in advance because that is when you see the lowest prices. Another best time would be low seasons like September, October, and November to March.

Usually, you will find cheaper airfares with advance bookings only. But you can still check airfares to London on different dates and special events to find major price drops. If you are struggling to find a good deal, let Traveloways hunt down a cheaper option for you.

What are the Major Attractions of London?

London is the treasure trove of famous landmarks, historic sites and cultural hotspots drawing millions of travelers each year. If you are wondering where to begin, here's some of the iconic places to visit.

  • Buckingham Palace
  • Tower of London
  • House of Parliament
  • Westminster Abbey
  • British Museum
  • Covent Garden
  • West End Theatre District
  • Hyde Park
  • The London Eye
  • Trafalgar Square
  • St. Paul's Cathedral
  • Borough Market
  • Warner Bros Studio Tour
  • Windsor Castle
  • Royal Albert Hall
  • Victoria Museum

Major International Airports of London

Excited to visit London and explore the gems of the city? Well then book your tickets online and enjoy a hassle-free journey. It has six major international airports serving the tourists coming from different parts of the world.

  • London Heathrow Airport (LHR)
  • London Gatwick Airport (LGW)
  • London Stansted Airport (STN)
  • London Luton Airport (LTN)
  • London City Airport (LCY)
  • London Southend Airport (SEN)

How to Book Cheap Flights Using Traveloways?

Want to cut down on your travel expenses? Well, then find the cheapest flights to London to enjoy traveling within a set budget. Follow the steps mentioned below for booking.

  • Open the official website of Traveloways.
  • Head towards the flight option.
  • Select the type of trip, number of passengers, departure and arrival destination, and date.
  • Hit the search button.
  • Choose a flight that falls within your budget.
  • Pay the applicable fees and confirm your booking.

You will be notified by mail about the successful booking. If there is any concern or you don’t receive your London flight itinerary via email, connect with us anytime and we will help you locate your journeys at ease.

Tips to Book Cheap Flights to London

Some handy tips for booking cheap flights to London are mentioned below for your convenience.

  • Join fare alerts to be updated and informed.
  • Opt for advance booking.
  • You can purchase your tickets using the loyalty price for cheap flights.
  • Keep checking the low fare calendar to secure an inexpensive flight.
  • Have flexible dates to enjoy an affordable flight.
  • Look out for deals and discounts.

Which are the Major Airlines that Fly to London?

To make your trip even more convenient, it's best if you know which airlines provide their services to London. Some of the major airlines flying to London are mentioned below;

  • British Airways
  • Delta Airlines
  • United Airlines
  • American Airlines
  • Virgin Atlantic
  • Emirates

Therefore, if you want to explore the beauty of London and get lost in its charm then do book yourself an affordable flight through Traveloways. Enjoy a comfortable journey to create everlasting memories.
